title: FlexJobs Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes job listings from FlexJobs by crawling public category and job pages. Does not require a login and avoids using the keyword search, which is restricted for anonymous users.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of FlexJobs category or listing URLs to start crawling from. The actor will find more links from these pages.

keyword.title: Keyword(s)
keyword.description: NOTE: This field is for compatibility and is NOT used to perform a search, as FlexJobs search is restricted. The scraper starts from broad category pages.

location.title: Location
location.description: NOTE: This field is for compatibility and is NOT used to perform a search.

posted_date.title: Date Posted
posted_date.description: NOTE: This field is for compatibility and is NOT used to perform a search.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. The scraper will stop when this limit is reached.

maxPagesPerList.title: Maximum Pages per List
maxPagesPerList.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit per category. The scraper stops paginating a category if it hits this limit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (recommended). Consider Residential proxies if you encounter blocking. A proxy is required to avoid being blocked.
